title: GET_ENTITY_SPEED_VECTOR
content:
0x9A8D700A51CB7B0D0x3ED2B997// GetEntitySpeedVector
Vector3 GET_ENTITY_SPEED_VECTOR(Entity entity, BOOL relative);Relative can be used for getting speed relative to the frame of the vehicle, to determine for example, if you are going in reverse (-y speed) or not (+y speed).
codeBlocks:
// GetEntitySpeedVector
Vector3 GET_ENTITY_SPEED_VECTOR(Entity entity, BOOL relative);
Relative can be used for getting speed relative to the frame of the vehicle, to determine for example, if you are going in reverse (-y speed) or not (+y speed).

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_SPEED_VECTOR
GetEntitySpeedVector(entity, false)
